roleset.name: to attack

role.descr: thing actually moving aggressively toward arg2 (non-agentive)

example.name: agentive attacker
example.text: to remove Gen. Manuel Noriega and safeguard their countries from a Sandinista onslaught

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Government officials , especially in Japan , probably would resist any onslaught of program trading by players trying to shrug off the U.S. furor over their activities and marching abroad with their business
example.arg: by players trying to shrug off the U.S. furor over their activities and marching abroad with their business

roleset.note: Based on nouns-00040, more-nouns. Updated by Julia. No VNcls.
